attributes.action: Increase the MLS for Bass to 45cm for commercial and recreational anglers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is aimed to get the government to raise the Minimum Landing Size for Bass (Dicentrarchus labrax) to 45cm. This would allow every fish to spawn at least once and allow us to move to a more sustainable Bass stock. We also urge the government to lobby the EU to introduce the MLS in all member states.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Increase the MLS for Bass to 45cm for commercial and recreational anglers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15383.asp

Prime Minister's Office
